content.raw:
`UNIT_RenderWidget_TEST` is failing for me on trusty:
~~~
********* Start testing of RenderWidget_TEST *********
Config: Using QTest library 4.8.6, Qt 4.8.6
PASS   : RenderWidget_TEST::initTestCase()
QWARN  : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::triggered() to gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnCopy()
QWARN  : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::triggered() to gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnPaste()
QWARN  : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::toggled(bool) to gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnModelEditor(bool)
QWARN  : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::triggered() to gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnOrtho()
QWARN  : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::triggered() to gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnPerspective()
QFATAL : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() Received signal 11
FAIL!  : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() Received a fatal error.
   Loc: [Unknown file(0)]
Totals: 1 passed, 1 failed, 0 skipped
********* Finished testing of RenderWidget_TEST *********
Aborted (core dumped)
~~~
backtrace:
~~~
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff61135d5 in QAction::setEnabled(bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff61135d5 in QAction::setEnabled(bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4
#1  0x00007ffff6ed9f31 in gazebo::gui::GLWidget::SetSelectedVisual (this=this@entry=0xad0a50, _vis=...)
    at gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:1100
#2  0x00007ffff6edcd14 in gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnCreateScene (this=this@entry=0xad0a50, _name=...)
    at gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:947
#3  0x00007ffff6ede385 in gazebo::gui::GLWidget::GLWidget (this=0xad0a50, _parent=<optimized out>)
    at gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:191
#4  0x00007ffff6ed2d2b in gazebo::gui::RenderWidget::RenderWidget (this=0xaca1a0, _parent=<optimized out>)
    at gazebo/gui/RenderWidget.cc:138
#5  0x00000000004097cf in RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget (this=<optimized out>)
    at gazebo/gui/RenderWidget_TEST.cc:27
#6  0x00007ffff5bee908 in QMetaMethod::invoke(QObject*, Qt::ConnectionType, QGenericReturnArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument) const () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#7  0x00007ffff5bf0dc2 in QMetaObject::invokeMethod(QObject*, char const*, Qt::ConnectionType, QGenericReturnArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#8  0x00007ffff6c0cfbf in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtTest.so.4
#9  0x00007ffff6c0dddf in QTest::qExec(QObject*, int, char**) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtTest.so.4
#10 0x0000000000407425 in main (argc=1, argv=0x7fffffffdc58)
    at gazebo/gui/RenderWidget_TEST.cc:55
(gdb)
~~~
content.html:
UNIT_RenderWidget_TEST is failing for me on trusty:

********* Start testing of RenderWidget_TEST *********
Config: Using QTest library 4.8.6, Qt 4.8.6
PASS   : RenderWidget_TEST::initTestCase()
QWARN  : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::triggered() to gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnCopy()
QWARN  : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::triggered() to gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnPaste()
QWARN  : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::toggled(bool) to gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnModelEditor(bool)
QWARN  : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::triggered() to gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnOrtho()
QWARN  : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() QObject::connect: Cannot connect (null)::triggered() to gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnPerspective()
QFATAL : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() Received signal 11
FAIL!  : RenderWidget_TEST::InsertWidget() Received a fatal error.
   Loc: [Unknown file(0)]
Totals: 1 passed, 1 failed, 0 skipped
********* Finished testing of RenderWidget_TEST *********
Aborted (core dumped)

backtrace:

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff61135d5 in QAction::setEnabled(bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtGui.so.4

#8  0x00007ffff6c0cfbf in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtTest.so.4
